idea-plugin.name: Monocai Color Theme
idea-plugin.description: Adds Monocai, inspired by Monokai and Monokai Pro, as an editor colorscheme. This color theme uses modern colors that will enhance readability whilst keeping eyestrain to a minimum.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• 2.0.2 Possible fix for Plugin Suggestion Popups.
  • 2.0.2a Renaming for better visibility in search results.
  • 2.0.2b Introduced highlight for the current line.
